body_html:
AUC is commonly used in LR or DNN models and I don't think everyone need to implement the user op again.

Now TF learn has implemented the streaming_auc in tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/metric_ops.py. We will test and hope it could be used out of the scope of TF learn API.
body_text:
AUC is commonly used in LR or DNN models and I don't think everyone need to implement the user op again.
Now TF learn has implemented the streaming_auc in tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/metric_ops.py. We will test and hope it could be used out of the scope of TF learn API.
body:
`AUC` is commonly used in LR or DNN models and I don't think everyone need to implement the user op again.

Now TF learn has implemented the `streaming_auc` in `tensorflow/tensorflow/contrib/metrics/python/ops/metric_ops.py`. We will test and hope it could be used out of the scope of TF learn API.
